content:
I think it's a great idea to carry forward the lessons from the bereavement support group. I've been thinking about seeking out a therapist or counselor who can provide guidance and support. I've also been considering joining online forums or social media communities that focus on grief, loss, and mental health. It would be nice to connect with others who understand what I'm going through and can offer support and advice.

Additionally, I've been thinking about starting a journal to process my emotions and reflect on my experiences. Writing has always been a therapeutic outlet for me, and I think it could be a great way to work through my feelings and gain some clarity.

It's also occurred to me that I might want to reach out to friends and family members who have gone through similar experiences. Sometimes, all we need is someone to talk to who understands what we're going through. I'm grateful for the support I've received so far, and I'm hopeful that I can continue to find ways to heal
